coreAttributes.name: hot pants
coreAttributes.description: A pair of very small, very tight shorts, commonly referred to as 'hot pants'. This particular pair are made of a stretchy, elastic material, which clings tightly to the wearer's every curve and crevice.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the hot pants, before pulling them up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the hot pants, before pulling them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the hot pants, before yanking them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] hot pants, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] hot pants, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] hot pants, before yanking them off.
